title: Pope Francis urges Hungarians to 'open doors' to migrants
description: The pontiff addressed up to 100,000 people, including Hungary's nationalist PM Viktor Orban.

title: Alan Shearer column: A happy club again - but things about to get even better for Newcastle
description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer is confident his old club Newcastle will secure a top-four finish and qualify for next season's Champions League.

title: Bulgari store in Paris robbed in broad daylight
description: Video shows suspects making a getaway on motorbikes from the city's flagship Bulgari store.

title: Suspected Islamic State chief Qurayshi killed in Syria, Turkey says
description: Abu-Hussein Al-Qurayshi was killed by Turkish forces on Saturday, Turkey's President Erdogan says.

title: Leicester v Everton: 'Loser goes down' in 'massive' relegation fixture
description: Leicester host Everton in a huge game at the bottom of the Premier League, with pundits predicting the loser will be relegated.

title: Arsenal v Wolfsburg preview: Women's Champions League team news, head-to-head and stats
description: Preview followed by live coverage of Monday's Women's Champions League semi-final second leg between Arsenal and Wolfsburg.

title: World Snooker Championship final 2023: Mark Selby makes first ever 147 in final
description: Watch as Mark Selby makes history as the first player ever to make a 147 maximum break in a World Snooker Championship final.

title: World Snooker Championship 147: Mark Selby records first ever maximum break in final
description: Mark Selby makes history as the first player ever to make a 147 maximum break in a World Championship final.

title: Sudan crisis: Chaos at port as thousands rush to leave
description: The BBC's Chief International Correspondent Lyse Doucet reports from Port Sudan as thousands flee.

title: Nurses' strike: 28-hour strike over pay under way
description: It will be the largest industrial action by nurses so far and risks patients' safety, NHS bosses say.

title: I don't know what Tierney has against us - Klopp questions referee
description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says referee Paul Tierney appears to have something "against" his team after their 4-3 win over Tottenham.

title: Coronation: Military rehearse parade on replica route
description: An airbase was transformed into a life-size replica of the procession route for the troops to practise.

title: Erling Haaland: Manchester City striker chasing Dixie Dean record after 50th goal of season
description: Erling Haaland nets his 50th goal of the season as Manchester City chase the Treble and he still has a chance to break Dixie Dean's English scoring record.

title: Khartoum branch of Sudan Central Bank in flames
description: Video shows a fire raging at a bank in the heart of the capital, Khartoum.

title: Francisco Oropeza: FBI hunt 'armed and dangerous' Texas shooting suspect
description: Francisco Oropeza is accused of killing five of his neighbours in Texas, including an eight-year-old.

title: Liverpool 4-3 Tottenham Hotspur: Reds edge Spurs in seven-goal thriller
description: Diogo Jota scores an injury-time winner as Liverpool edge Tottenham in a seven-goal thriller, after Spurs had come from 3-0 down to level.

title: Terrorists limited to two boxes of books in prison cells
description: New rules on extremists in custody will also stop them from playing a "leading role" in religious services.

title: Exeter hopes ended by ruthless La Rochelle
description: Exeter Chiefs' bid to reach the Champions Cup final is ended by a brilliant semi-final display by holders La Rochelle.

title: Manchester United 1-0 Aston Villa: Bruno Fernandes goal seals narrow win for Red Devils
description: Bruno Fernandes scores his 100th career league goal to boost Manchester United's Champions League hopes and end Aston Villa's 10-match unbeaten run.

title: World Snooker Championship Final 2023: Best shots from first session as Mark Selby v Luca Brecel
description: Watch the best shots from the first session of the World Championship snooker final as Belgium's Luca Brecel breezes into a 6-2 lead over England's Mark Selby at the Crucible Theatre.

title: UK arranges extra evacuation flight from Port Sudan on Monday
description: The flight follows the evacuation of 2,122 people on 23 flights from an airfield near Khartoum.

title: World Snooker Championship 2023: Luca Brecel leads Mark Selby 6-2 after first session
description: Luca Brecel opens up a 6-2 advantage over four-time champion Mark Selby in the World Championship final.

title: Climate change: How it's endangering Australian wine
description: Australia is already home to some of the hottest and driest wine regions on the planet.

title: Manchester City 4-1 Reading: Hosts survive scare to return to second in WSL
description: Manchester City recover from conceding a first-minute goal to thrash bottom side Reading and rise to second in the Women's Super League.

title: Fulham 1-2 Manchester City: Erling Haaland scores 50th goal of the season as City go above Arsenal
description: Manchester City beat Fulham to return to the top of the Premier League as Erling Haaland scores his 50th goal of the season in all competitions.

title: Rangers 0-1 Celtic: Jota header sinks Old Firm rivals in semi-final to keep treble dream alive
description: A first-half header from Jota is enough to settle a tense Old Firm encounter at Hampden, sending Celtic into the Scottish Cup final against Inverness Caley Thistle.

title: Adidas sued by investors over Kanye West deal
description: Shareholders claim the sportswear giant knew about the rapper's behaviour before it cut ties in 2022.

title: Cuba cancels May Day parade because of fuel shortages
description: Acute shortages force the communist government to scrap mass Workers' Day celebrations in Havana.

title: Women's Six Nations 2023: Key questions for the future after record-breaking tournament
description: The 2023 Women's Six Nations saw record crowds and more contracted players than ever before, but what is next for the sport which continues to evolve?

title: Drone captures moment lost child is found
description: The child was located in scrubland near Ellensburg, Washington, after she ran off and was reported missing.

title: Nurses' strike: Nurse union relaxes strike rules for critical services
description: The NHS says 'positive discussions' with the RCN mean nurses will cover some departments.

title: Bodmin murder investigation after man stabbed in brawl
description: The victim, aged in his 30s, died at the scene and a man aged 24 is arrested on suspicion of murder.

title: Caerphilly: Baby in hospital after dog attack
description: The attack happened in Caerphilly county, where there have been two previous fatal dog attacks.

title: Sudan crisis: Air strikes and fighting in Khartoum as truce collapses
description: The army says it is attacking the capital from all directions to flush out its paramilitary rivals.

title: Rail strikes cynically targeting Eurovision, minister says
description: Transport Secretary Mark Harper says a "fair and reasonable pay offer" has been made to rail workers.

title: Perez wins in Azerbaijan to close gap on Verstappen
description: Sergio Perez drives a consummate race with help from the safety car to beat Red Bull team-mate Max Verstappen and win the Azerbaijan Grand Prix.

title: Call for thorough investigation after ferry grounding
description: The MV Pentalina had 60 people on board when it grounded at St Margaret's Hope on Saturday night.

title: Liz Truss contests £12,000 bill over use of Chevening country house
description: The former prime minister says most of the bill relates to using Chevening for government business.

title: Ty Hafan: Unique bond of mums who met at children's hospice
description: A group of mums of children with life-shortening conditions plan to tackle three Welsh peaks.

title: King Charles coronation: Unseen archive released of the young prince and Royal Family
description: Footage filmed for the 1969 Royal Family documentary shows King Charles III with Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Virtual reality used to address victim court trauma
description: A Belfast tech firm is helping victims prepare for court with the help of virtual reality software.

title: The Papers: Nation to chant for Charles, as King vows to serve
description: Sunday's front pages focus on King Charles's much-anticipated Coronation ceremony.

title: Biden jokes about his age at White House Correspondents' Dinner
description: The US president enjoyed some banter at the annual White House Correspondents' Dinner.
